metadata.title: Certified Record v1.0 — Adamantine Standard (Master Archive)
metadata.description: Authoritative, PDF/A-2u-compliant Master Archive establishing the Adamantine Standard. Includes deterministic build chain, verification scripts, and cross-ledger registration data. Implements the Genesis Proof protocol for lawful authority verification.
metadata.notes: Includes Certified_Record_v1.0.pdf, verification scripts, LaTeX appendix, and ledger_entry.json.
